ComicInfo.Title: Time!; The Death of Richard!; Luftwaffe!; Raiders Attack!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Time!: Details how General Balfourier's Iron Corps bought France valuable time in World War I by counter-attacking the Germans, temporarily halting their advance.
The Death of Richard!: Richard ascends to the throne of England by murdering those who lie in his way, but ultimately dies battling Henry Tudor, who succeeds him to the throne.
Luftwaffe!: Recounts how the Luftwaffe contributed to key victories for the Nazis, but after wasting resources in the futile Battle of Britain they were slow to recover and by then Allied bombing on German territory gradually depleted their ability to sustain themselves.
Raiders Attack!: Details how US forces depleted supply lines to Red China, leading up to the invasion of Inchon.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Authorized A. C. M. P. Conforms to the Comics Code
ComicInfo.Characters: Kaiser Wilhelm I,General Philippe Petain,General Maurice Balfourier
ComicInfo.Penciller: Joe Maneely,Sid Greene,Dick Ayers,Gene Colan,Joe Maneely,Sid Greene,Dick Ayers,Gene Colan
ComicInfo.Inker: Joe Maneely,Sid Greene,Ernie Bache,Gene Colan,Joe Maneely,Sid Greene,Ernie Bache,Gene Colan
